Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It looks like an ordinary stage.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gift boxes and pink corals scatter around the stage. You can tell that the mechanoids put in a lot of effort to decorate this place.'}
{2: "It's quite lovely.", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Indeed. The colors of the stage and those boxes look very adorable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They are so calming that I feel like I can relax.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Spending most of your time either on the steel-gray Babylonia or the ashen surface, you cannot help but feel cheerful in such a colorful venue.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did people often spend their time in places like this in spring during the Golden Age?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Probably?', 3: '13', 4: 'Maybe somewhere else as well?', 5: '13'}
{3: 'Ayla said that people would go hiking for a romantic date in this season. Perhaps... people would also watch movies? Or hang around in other places?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hang around in other places?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia does not seem to understand what you meant.'}
{2: 'Is there somewhere you want to go, Lucia?', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nowhere in particular.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Because I've been to many of them with you already, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Islands, deserts, even space stations... Our footprints have reached many places the people from the Golden Age couldn't even imagine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds about right.', 3: '32', 4: "It's not the same.", 5: '25'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's not the same?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While you have visited many places together, you traveled to most of them for your "missions."'}
{3: 'But to "hang out" in a place in spring...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Will you visit the places we fought together with me in the future, then, Commandant? On the day when peace comes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We\'ll travel and "hang out" in those places.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a promise, then.", 4: '1'}
